text: Agar on du ʙa kusis az tu ʙixohand, to cizero, ki namedoni cist, ʙo Man sarik gardoni, ito'atason nakun. Dar dunjo ʙo onho ʙa tarife pisandida zindagi kun va xud rohi kasonero, ki ʙa dargohi Man ʙozmegardand, dar pes gir. Bozgasti hamai sumo ʙa sui Man ast va Man az korhoe, ki mekardaed, ogohaton mekunam
